item.title: Two good tutorials for creating Hugo websites through GitHub pages and Netlify
item.description: I found two great tutorials using Hugo to build your own website and then publish on either GitHub or Netlify. Publish on github with Hugo directly: https://youtu.be/3wkR8GyDODs Publish on Netlify with Blogdown: https://alison.rbind.io/post/up-and-running-with-blogdown/

item.title: Make slides work in blogdown
item.description: I made some slides introducing primer design tips. I want to put it in my blog; however, blogdown cannot render xaringan Rmd files if I put them in the post folder. I searched a little bit and found one solution: put the raw md file content in your remark.js slides html file. Here is how I do it. I am using the hugo-lithium-theme as an example. I made the slides using xaringan;
